actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the energy efficient appliance credit and the nonbusiness energy property credit.
short_title: Consumer and Manufacturer Energy Efficiency Tax Credit Extension Act of 2008

summary.text: Consumer and Manufacturer Energy Efficiency Tax Credit Extension Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2009 the tax credits for: (1) energy efficient appliances (i.e., dishwashers, clothes washers, and refrigerators that meet certain energy conservation standards); and (2) nonbusiness energy property expenditures.

titles.title: Consumer and Manufacturer Energy Efficiency Tax Credit Extension Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the energy efficient appliance credit and the nonbusiness energy property credit.
